price: 37. Markaasuu Aadam ka helay Rabbigiis ereyo uu ku ilhaamiyey8, wuuna ka toobad aqbalay. hubaal (Alle) waa Toobad Aqbalaha, Naxariista Badan.
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: 8. Alle wuxuu baray Aadam kelmedo lagu toobad dalbo uu ka aqbalay, waana kelmedaha ku soo arooray Suuradda Al- Acraaf Aayadda: 23.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
